# redis-typescript

redis for typescript and commonjs with promise

## Install

```bash
npm install redis redis-typescript --save
```

## Exmaple

### commonjs

```js
const Redis = require("redis-typescript");

const client = Redis.createClient({
  port: 6379,
  host: "127.0.0.1",
  password: ""
});

client.on("ready", () => {
  console.info("redis ready");
});

client.on("error", err => {
  console.info("redis connection error: ", err);
});

const mock = {
  string: {
    key: "54684541654",
    value: "sdfasreqweq"
  },
  hash: {
    key: "Sfsrewtfgdrgdg",
    object: {
      name: "Tom",
      age: 18
    }
  }
};

(async () => {
  // key value
  console.log(await client.set(mock.string.key, mock.string.value));
  // key
  console.log(await client.get(mock.string.key));
  // key
  console.log(await client.exists(mock.string.key));
  // key seconds
  console.log(await client.expire(mock.string.key, 3));

  // key field value
  console.log(await client.hset(mock.hash.key, "name", mock.hash.object.name));
  // key object
  console.log(await client.hmset(mock.hash.key, mock.hash.object));
  // key field
  console.log(await client.hget(mock.hash.key, "name"));
  // key field
  console.log(await client.hexists(mock.hash.key, "name"));
  // key seconds
  console.log(await client.expire(mock.hash.key, 3));
})();
```

### typescript

```ts
import Redis from "redis-typescript";

const client = Redis.createClient({
  port: 6379,
  host: "127.0.0.1",
  password: ""
});

client.on("ready", () => {
  console.info("redis ready");
});

client.on("error", err => {
  console.info("redis connection error: ", err);
});

const mock = {
  string: {
    key: "54684541654",
    value: "sdfasreqweq"
  },
  hash: {
    key: "Sfsrewtfgdrgdg",
    object: {
      name: "Tom",
      age: 18
    }
  }
};

(async () => {
  // key value
  console.log(await client.set(mock.string.key, mock.string.value));
  // key
  console.log(await client.get(mock.string.key));
  // key
  console.log(await client.exists(mock.string.key));
  // key seconds
  console.log(await client.expire(mock.string.key, 3));

  // key field value
  console.log(await client.hset(mock.hash.key, "name", mock.hash.object.name));
  // key object
  console.log(await client.hmset(mock.hash.key, mock.hash.object));
  // key field
  console.log(await client.hget(mock.hash.key, "name"));
  // key field
  console.log(await client.hexists(mock.hash.key, "name"));
  // key seconds
  console.log(await client.expire(mock.hash.key, 3));
})();
```
